  3/** @file    vsip/core/fft/backend.hpp
  4    @author  Stefan Seefeld
  5    @date    2006-02-17
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: fft backend interfaces.
  7
  8    This file defines fft backend interfaces to be implemented by
  9    third-party library bridges.
 10*/
 11
 12#ifndef VSIP_CORE_FFT_BACKEND_HPP
 13#define VSIP_CORE_FFT_BACKEND_HPP
 14
 15#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 16#include <vsip/core/layout.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>
 18
 19namespace vsip
 20{
 21
 22/// Perform a forward FFT.
 23int const fft_fwd = -2;
 24/// Perform an inverse FFT.
 25int const fft_inv = -1;
 26
 27namespace impl
 28{
 29namespace fft
 30{
 31
 32bool const forward = true;
 33bool const inverse = false;
 34  
 35template <typename B>
 36struct is_fft_backend { static bool const value = false;};
 37template <typename B>
 38struct is_fftm_backend { static bool const value = false;};
 39
 40template <dimension_type D, typename T, int A, int E>
 41struct Backend
 42{
 43  typedef T scalar_type;
 44  static dimension_type const dim = D;
 45  static int const axis = A;
 46  static int const exponent = E;
 47  
 48};
 49
 50template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O, int S> 
 51class Fft_backend;
 52
 53template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O, int S> 
 54struct is_fft_backend<Fft_backend<D, I, O, S> >
 55{ static bool const value = true;};
 56
 57/// 1D real forward FFT
 58template <typename T>
 59class Fft_backend<1, T, std::complex<T>, 0>
 60  : public Backend<1, T, 0, -1>
 61{
 62public:
 63  typedef T input_value_type;
 64  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
 65
 66  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
 67  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-1D-real-forward"; }
 68  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
 69  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
 70  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<1> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<1> &rtl_out)
 71  {
 72    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
 73    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
 74    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
 75    rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
 76  }
 77  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<1> &) { return false;}
 78  /// real -> complex (interleaved)
 79  virtual void out_of_place(T *, stride_type,
 80			    std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
 81			    length_type)
 82  {
 83    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
 84				  "unimplemented"));
 85  }
 86  /// real -> complex (split)
 87  virtual void out_of_place(T *, stride_type,
 88			    std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
 89			    length_type)
 90  {
 91    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
 92				  "unimplemented"));
 93  }
 94};
 95
 96/// 1D real inverse FFT
 97template <typename T>
 98class Fft_backend<1, std::complex<T>, T, 0>
 99  : public Backend<1, T, 0, 1>
100{
101public:
102  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
103  typedef T output_value_type;
104
105  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
106  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-1D-real-inverse"; }
107  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
108  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
109  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<1> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<1> &rtl_out)
110  {
111    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
112    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
113    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
114    rtl_in.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
115  }
116  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<1> &) { return false;}
117  /// complex (interleaved) -> real
118  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
119			    T *, stride_type,
120			    length_type)
121  {
122    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
123				  "unimplemented"));
124  }
125  /// real -> complex (split)
126  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
127			    T *, stride_type,
128			    length_type)
129  {
130    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
131				  "unimplemented"));
132  }
133};
134
135/// 1D complex FFT
136template <typename T, int S>
137class Fft_backend<1, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
138  : public Backend<1, T, 0, S == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1>
139{
140public:
141  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
142  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
143
144  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
145  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-1D-complex"; }
146  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
147  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
148  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<1> &rtl_inout)
149  {
150    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
151    rtl_inout.pack = stride_unit_dense;
152    rtl_inout.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
153    rtl_inout.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
154  }
155  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<1> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<1> &rtl_out)
156  {
157    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
158    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
159    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
160    rtl_in.complex = rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
161  }
162  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<1> &) { return false;}
163  /// complex (interleaved) in-place
164  virtual void in_place(std::complex<T> *, stride_type, length_type)
165  {
166    if (S == fft_fwd)
167      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
168				    "unimplemented"));
169    else
170      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
171				    "unimplemented"));
172  }
173  /// complex (split) in-place
174  virtual void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type, length_type)
175  {
176    if (S == fft_fwd)
177      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
178				    "unimplemented"));
179    else
180      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
181				    "unimplemented"));
182  }
183  /// complex (interleaved) by-reference
184  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
185			    std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
186			    length_type)
187  {
188    if (S == fft_fwd)
189      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
190				    "unimplemented"));
191    else
192      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
193				    "unimplemented"));
194  }
195  /// complex (split) by-reference
196  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
197			    std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
198			    length_type)
199  {
200    if (S == fft_fwd)
201      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
202				    "unimplemented"));
203    else
204      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
205				    "unimplemented"));
206  }
207};
208
209/// 2D real forward FFT
210template <typename T, int S>
211class Fft_backend<2, T, std::complex<T>, S>
212  : public Backend<2, T, S, -1>
213{
214public:
215  typedef T input_value_type;
216  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
217
218  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
219  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-2D-real-forward"; }
220  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
221  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
222  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<2> &rtl_out)
223  {
224    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
225    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
226    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
227    rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
228  }
229  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<2> &) { return false;}
230  /// real -> complex (interleaved) by-reference
231  virtual void out_of_place(T *,
232			    stride_type, stride_type,
233			    std::complex<T> *,
234			    stride_type, stride_type,
235			    length_type, length_type)
236  {
237    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
238				  "unimplemented"));
239  }
240  /// real -> complex (split) by-reference
241  virtual void out_of_place(T *,
242			    stride_type, stride_type,
243			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
244			    stride_type, stride_type,
245			    length_type, length_type)
246  {
247    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
248				  "unimplemented"));
249  }
250};
251
252/// 2D real inverse FFT
253template <typename T, int S>
254class Fft_backend<2, std::complex<T>, T, S>
255  : public Backend<2, T, S, 1>
256{
257public:
258  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
259  typedef T output_value_type;
260
261  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
262  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-2D-real-inverse"; }
263  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
264  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
265  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<2> &rtl_out)
266  {
267    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
268    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
269    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
270    rtl_in.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
271  }
272  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<2> &) { return false;}
273  /// complex (interleaved) -> real by-reference
274  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
275			    stride_type, stride_type,
276			    T *,
277			    stride_type, stride_type,
278			    length_type, length_type)
279  {
280    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
281				  "unimplemented"));
282  }
283  /// complex (split) -> real by-reference
284  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
285			    stride_type, stride_type,
286			    T *,
287			    stride_type, stride_type,
288			    length_type, length_type)
289  {
290    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<1, real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
291				  "unimplemented"));
292  }
293};

295/// 2D complex FFT
296template <typename T, int S>
297class Fft_backend<2, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
298  : public Backend<2, T, S, S == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1>
299{
300public:
301  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
302  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
303
304  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
305  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-2D-complex"; }
306  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
307  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
308  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_inout)
309  {
310    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
311    rtl_inout.pack = stride_unit_dense;
312    rtl_inout.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
313    rtl_inout.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
314  }
315  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<2> &rtl_out)
316  {
317    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
318    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
319    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
320    rtl_in.complex = rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
321  }
322  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<2> &) { return false;}
323  /// complex (interleaved) in-place
324  virtual void in_place(std::complex<T> *,
325			stride_type, stride_type,
326			length_type, length_type)
327  {
328    if (S == fft_fwd)
329      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
330				    "unimplemented"));
331    else
332      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
333				    "unimplemented"));
334  }
335  /// complex (split) in-place
336  virtual void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
337			stride_type, stride_type,
338			length_type, length_type)
339  {
340    if (S == fft_fwd)
341      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
342				    "unimplemented"));
343    else
344      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
345				    "unimplemented"));
346  }
347  /// complex (interleaved) by-reference
348  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
349			    stride_type, stride_type,
350			    std::complex<T> *,
351			    stride_type, stride_type,
352			    length_type, length_type)
353  {
354    if (S == fft_fwd)
355      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
356				    "unimplemented"));
357    else
358      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
359				    "unimplemented"));
360  }
361  /// complex (split) by-reference
362  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
363			    stride_type, stride_type,
364			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
365			    stride_type, stride_type,
366			    length_type, length_type)
367  {
368    if (S == fft_fwd)
369      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
370				    "unimplemented"));
371    else
372      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<2, complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
373				    "unimplemented"));
374  }
375};

377/// 3D real forward FFT
378template <typename T, int S>
379class Fft_backend<3, T, std::complex<T>, S>
380  : public Backend<3, T, S, -1>
381{
382public:
383  typedef T input_value_type;
384  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
385
386  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
387  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-2D-real-forward"; }
388  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
389  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
390  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<3> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<3> &rtl_out)
391  {
392    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
393    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
394    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
395    rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
396  }
397  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<3> &) { return false;}
398  /// real -> complex (interleaved) by-reference
399  virtual void out_of_place(T *,
400			    stride_type,
401			    stride_type,
402			    stride_type,
403			    std::complex<T> *,
404			    stride_type,
405			    stride_type,
406			    stride_type,
407			    length_type,
408			    length_type,
409			    length_type)
410  {
411    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
412				  "unimplemented"));
413  }
414  /// real -> complex (split) by-reference
415  virtual void out_of_place(T *,
416			    stride_type,
417			    stride_type,
418			    stride_type,
419			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
420			    stride_type,
421			    stride_type,
422			    stride_type,
423			    length_type,
424			    length_type,
425			    length_type)
426  {
427    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
428				  "unimplemented"));
429  }
430};

432/// 3D real inverse FFT
433template <typename T, int S>
434class Fft_backend<3, std::complex<T>, T, S>
435  : public Backend<3, T, S, 1>
436{
437public:
438  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
439  typedef T output_value_type;
440
441  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
442  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-2D-real-inverse"; }
443  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
444  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
445  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<3> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<3> &rtl_out)
446  {
447    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
448    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
449    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
450    rtl_in.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
451  }
452  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<3> &) { return false;}
453  /// complex (interleaved) -> real by-reference
454  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
455			    stride_type,
456			    stride_type,
457			    stride_type,
458			    T *,
459			    stride_type,
460			    stride_type,
461			    stride_type,
462			    length_type,
463			    length_type,
464			    length_type)
465  {
466    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
467				  "unimplemented"));
468  }
469  /// complex (split) -> real by-reference
470  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
471			    stride_type,
472			    stride_type,
473			    stride_type,
474			    T *,
475			    stride_type,
476			    stride_type,
477			    stride_type,
478			    length_type,
479			    length_type,
480			    length_type)
481  {
482    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
483				  "unimplemented"));
484  }
485};

487/// 3D complex FFT
488template <typename T, int S>
489class Fft_backend<3, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
490  : public Backend<3, T, 0, S == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1>
491{
492public:
493  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
494  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
495
496  virtual ~Fft_backend() {}
497  virtual char const* name() { return "fft-backend-2D-complex"; }
498  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
499  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
500  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<3> &rtl_inout)
501  {
502    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
503    rtl_inout.pack = stride_unit_dense;
504    rtl_inout.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
505    rtl_inout.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
506  }
507  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<3> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<3> &rtl_out)
508  {
509    // By default use unit_stride, tuple<0, 1, 2>, cmplx_inter_fmt
510    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
511    rtl_in.order = rtl_out.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
512    rtl_in.complex = rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
513  }
514  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<3> &) { return false;}
515  /// complex (interleaved) in-place
516  virtual void in_place(std::complex<T> *,
517			stride_type,
518			stride_type,
519			stride_type,
520			length_type,
521			length_type,
522			length_type)
523  {
524    if (S == fft_fwd)
525      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
526				    "unimplemented"));
527    else
528      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
529				    "unimplemented"));
530  }
531  /// complex (split) in-place
532  virtual void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
533			stride_type,
534			stride_type,
535			stride_type,
536			length_type,
537			length_type,
538			length_type)
539  {
540    if (S == fft_fwd)
541      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
542				    "unimplemented"));
543    else
544      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
545				    "unimplemented"));
546  }
547  /// complex (interleaved) by-reference
548  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
549			    stride_type,
550			    stride_type,
551			    stride_type,
552			    std::complex<T> *,
553			    stride_type,
554			    stride_type,
555			    stride_type,
556			    length_type,
557			    length_type,
558			    length_type)
559  {
560    if (S == fft_fwd)
561      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
562				    "unimplemented"));
563    else
564      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
565				    "unimplemented"));
566  }
567  /// complex (split) by-reference
568  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
569			    stride_type,
570			    stride_type,
571			    stride_type,
572			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
573			    stride_type,
574			    stride_type,
575			    stride_type,
576			    length_type,
577			    length_type,
578			    length_type)
579  {
580    if (S == fft_fwd)
581      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
582				    "unimplemented"));
583    else
584      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fft_backend<3, complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
585				    "unimplemented"));
586  }
587};
588
589/// FFTM
590template <typename I, typename O, int A, int D>
591class Fftm_backend;
592
593template <typename I, typename O, int A, int D>
594struct is_fftm_backend<Fftm_backend<I, O, A, D> >
595{ static bool const value = true;};
596
597/// real forward FFTM
598template <typename T, int A>
599class Fftm_backend<T, std::complex<T>, A, fft_fwd>
600  : public Backend<2, T, 1 - A, -1>
601{
602public:
603  typedef T input_value_type;
604  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
605
606  virtual ~Fftm_backend() {}
607  virtual char const* name() { return "fftm-backend-real-forward"; }
608  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
609  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
610  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<2> &rtl_out)
611  {
612    // By default use unit_stride,
613    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
614    // an ordering that gives unit strides on the axis perpendicular to A,
615    if (A == vsip::col) rtl_in.order = tuple<1, 0, 2>();
616    else rtl_in.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
617    rtl_out.order = rtl_in.order;
618    // and interleaved complex.
619    rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
620  }
621  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<2> &) { return false;}
622  /// real -> complex (interleaved) by-reference
623  virtual void out_of_place(T *,
624			    stride_type, stride_type,
625			    std::complex<T> *,
626			    stride_type, stride_type,
627			    length_type, length_type)
628  {
629    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
630				  "unimplemented"));
631  }
632  /// real -> complex (split) by-reference
633  virtual void out_of_place(T *,
634			    stride_type, stride_type,
635			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
636			    stride_type, stride_type,
637			    length_type, length_type)
638  {
639    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<real, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
640				  "unimplemented"));
641  }
642};
643
644/// real inverse FFTM
645template <typename T, int A>
646class Fftm_backend<std::complex<T>, T, A, fft_inv>
647  : public Backend<2, T, 1 - A, 1>
648{
649public:
650  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
651  typedef T output_value_type;
652
653  virtual ~Fftm_backend() {}
654  virtual char const* name() { return "fftm-backend-real-inverse"; }
655  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
656  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
657  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<2> &rtl_out)
658  {
659    // By default use unit_stride,
660    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
661    // an ordering that gives unit strides on the axis perpendicular to A,
662    if (A == vsip::col) rtl_in.order = tuple<1, 0, 2>();
663    else rtl_in.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
664    rtl_out.order = rtl_in.order;
665    // and interleaved complex.
666    rtl_in.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
667  }
668  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<2> &) { return false;}
669  /// complex (interleaved) -> real by-reference
670  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
671			    stride_type, stride_type,
672			    T *,
673			    stride_type, stride_type,
674			    length_type, length_type)
675  {
676    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
677				  "unimplemented"));
678  }
679  /// complex (split) -> real by-reference
680  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
681			    stride_type, stride_type,
682			    T *,
683			    stride_type, stride_type,
684			    length_type, length_type)
685  {
686    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<real, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
687				  "unimplemented"));
688  }
689};
690
691/// complex FFTM
692template <typename T, int A, int D>
693class Fftm_backend<std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, A, D>
694  : public Backend<2, T, 1 - A, D == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1>
695{
696public:
697  typedef std::complex<T> input_value_type;
698  typedef std::complex<T> output_value_type;
699
700  virtual ~Fftm_backend() {}
701  virtual char const* name() { return "fftm-backend-complex"; }
702  virtual bool supports_scale() { return false;}
703  virtual bool supports_cuda_memory() { return false;}
704  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_inout)
705  {
706    // By default use unit_stride,
707    rtl_inout.pack = stride_unit_dense;
708    // an ordering that gives unit strides on the axis perpendicular to A,
709    if (A == vsip::col) rtl_inout.order = tuple<1, 0, 2>();
710    else rtl_inout.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
711    // and interleaved complex.
712    rtl_inout.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
713  }
714  virtual void query_layout(Rt_layout<2> &rtl_in, Rt_layout<2> &rtl_out)
715  {
716    // By default use unit_stride,
717    rtl_in.pack = rtl_out.pack = stride_unit_dense;
718    // an ordering that gives unit strides on the axis perpendicular to A,
719    if (A == vsip::col) rtl_in.order = tuple<1, 0, 2>();
720    else rtl_in.order = tuple<0, 1, 2>();
721    rtl_out.order = rtl_in.order;
722    // and interleaved complex.
723    rtl_in.complex = rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
724  }
725  virtual bool requires_copy(Rt_layout<2> &) { return false;}
726  /// complex (interleaved) in-place
727  virtual void in_place(std::complex<T> *,
728			stride_type, stride_type,
729			length_type, length_type)
730  {
731    if (D == fft_fwd)
732      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
733				    "unimplemented"));
734    else
735      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
736				    "unimplemented"));
737  }
738  /// complex (split) in-place
739  virtual void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
740			stride_type, stride_type,
741			length_type, length_type)
742  {
743    if (D == fft_fwd)
744      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_fwd>::in_place "
745				    "unimplemented"));
746    else
747      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_inv>::in_place "
748				    "unimplemented"));
749  }
750  /// complex (interleaved) by-reference
751  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
752			    stride_type, stride_type,
753			    std::complex<T> *,
754			    stride_type, stride_type,
755			    length_type, length_type)
756  {
757    if (D == fft_fwd)
758      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
759				    "unimplemented"));
760    else
761      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
762				    "unimplemented"));
763  }
764  /// complex (split) by-reference
765  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
766			    stride_type, stride_type,
767			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
768			    stride_type, stride_type,
769			    length_type, length_type)
770  {
771    if (D == fft_fwd)
772      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_fwd>::out_of_place "
773				    "unimplemented"));
774    else
775      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented("Fftm_backend<complex, fft_inv>::out_of_place "
776				    "unimplemented"));
777  }
778};
